Attribute.name: style
Attribute.value: color:#666; text-decoration:none; margin-bottom:10px; padding-bottom:20px; border-bottom:1px dotted #ccc;

Attribute.name: style
Attribute.value: list-style-type:none; display:inline; background:url(../images/tick.gif) left 7px no-repeat; float:left; width:650px; font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size:11px; color:#003366; line-height:20px; text-align:left; text-decoration:none; padding:0 0 0 10px;
